lenders.name: AmbidextrousMusic
lenders.loan_because: If it's wasn't for people like my brother/business partner, his wife & my wife I wouldn't have my on production company and be able to follow my dreams. So I want to give others the same kind of help that I got.
lenders.occupational_info: We write and produce music for artist, my self included, as well as networks like FOX Sports Net who are our biggest client. We also promote nostalgic hip-hop events called "Deja Vu It's 92" in Houston to preserve the legacy of authentic hip-hop at it best. Our future goals are to get into film & we have a tee-shirt line ready to launch in 08 called LOCTURNAL. It's all entertainment so everything we do is one in the same.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because:
Entrepreneurs can change the world.  When people connect through great services like Kiva, great things happen.

I started my career in the non-profit sector with the US-Baltic Foundation, providing educational and technical aid.  My cousin works in microfinance in Benin.  It is truly amazing how effective it can be.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an entrepreneur that most recently co-founded Socialtext.  We make wiki software like what powers Wikipedia.  "Wiki Wiki" means "very quick" in Hawaiian and wikis are wonderfuly simple tools for collaboration.

Socialtext often donates wikis in-kind to non-profit organizations and by default provide a 50% discount to them.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much in my life, and it is important to me to show my daughter how small things can change the world, rather than sitting around and talking about it all day!
lenders.occupational_info: Lots of studying to become an anthropologist

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: Everyday I work with businesses and colleagues all over the world and help them grow.  I love to travel and the best part of any trip is the people I meet.  I was an entrepreneur before I went into a corporate role and greatly admire every person that has the ambition , drive and perseverance to create their own destiny. I  believe the world is small, we're all neighbours,  and helping eachother is only natural.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a global marketing manager for a major international technology firm.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: To help others achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It is important to give back and give people the chance to improve their life!  If we all do something, our world will be a better place for our children.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second language to Adults.

lenders.name: Cari
lenders.loan_because: I can reach out across thousands of miles and help, one on one from me to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a team of specialists to create cumputer systems for the company I work for and it's customers.

lenders.name: Albert
lenders.loan_because: I wish to give!
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and have returned to university for further education.

lenders.name: Mahendra
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who have the courage and the will to work hard and support themselves & their family. This is true capitalism..
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes Jet engines for the largest and most poweful airplanes to the small business jets.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: What better way to show human compassion than to give the money you would spend on your daily Starbucks coffee to people who can then in turn help their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Airline Representative.  In addition to working as a senior Supervisor in a demanding hospital setting supervising technicians who provide acute care to all areas of a 800 plus bed hospital.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because:
I can. 
I want to encourage women in impoverished areas start and be successful with their businesses.

lenders.name: Michael & Chhaya
lenders.loan_because: Helping individuals with money is the next best thing to actually helping them in person.
lenders.occupational_info: IMichael runs a small business involved in selling dental instruments; Chhaya is a medical doctor who specializes in glandular problems in children.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: giving makes my happy

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone out to make their life easier

lenders.name: Anders
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a briliant idea to make the world more equal and less tense.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm making sure that my team creates and deliver what is expected by an agreement.

lenders.name: Sondra
lenders.loan_because: Much was given to me as a young struggling parent. I'll never forget that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a hospital

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: it is such a small thing to me, and such a huge thing for the person receiving the help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  a wife, and a mother of am amazing beautiful little spirit who is nearly 6 years old. I am doing the best I can and strive to be better every day, and make the world a better place for my child and others

lenders.name: Marcy & Bob
lenders.loan_because: it makes us happy to support someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Marcy is a teacher.  She teaches 4th grade students who have special needs or disabilities.

lenders.name: Les
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to help people help themselves, their family and their community.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I connect companies looking for engineers with engineers looking for a new opportunity. It's great because I get to help people.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I am my brothers keeper and I feel responsible for others. Imagine if each person helped another person in the world.  You don't have to be a millionaire to help.  I love KIVA this is such a great idea - I saw this on Oprah and am telling all my friends to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a secretary and shuffle papers and I teach ESL (English as a Second Language) at Marietta College.  I love to work with people and help them.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I know I can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 3rd grade.

lenders.name: Trisha
lenders.loan_because: There is a time in everyone's life when they need the help of others and I have been fortunate to have been given a lot of help in my life and want to pass it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher.  I teach children who have hearing impairments, and I work with them one on one at their school.  I teach children from four years old to 18, and we work on everything from speech and language skills, school work, to social skills.

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: I am consantly seeking out ways in which I can help others and connect with other parts of the world I live in. Although my budget is limited, I believe that every little bit helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying English Literature at The University of Toronto and I am hoping to go to graduate school.  I have a freelance writing business and I am a part-time musician.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: Every single person deserves the dignity of working and supporting themselves.  Charity is most often what they need the least.  What people need is a little help to get going.
lenders.occupational_info: I register documents and plans for land ownership in British Columbia Canada.

lenders.name: Line
lenders.loan_because: I just think it's a good think
lenders.occupational_info: I working in hospital too give the people the medicament that they need.   Excuse my english, my languahge is french

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and feel very fortunate to be able to help others. The biggest gift we receive is the gift of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise a number of retail stores with sales in the tens of millions of dollars.

lenders.name: Krysta
lenders.loan_because: I started working a real on-the-books job a few months ago [Im only fifteen] and realized how hard a dollar is to earn, so I decided to use my money for something good.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare/serve food and clean up afterwards. The hours arent that great but Im thankful I have it.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I'm a big believer in helping others start a business & thru KIVA, it can be done with a minimal of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired, but had my own embroidery business for ten years.  It was done with a machine, rather than with the skills of hand work!!

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and show my children everyone can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I am a married Mom of two and I work part time for a courier company.

lenders.name: Daianna
lenders.loan_because: "We are here not to see through one another, but to see one another through"...I read that somewhere and carry that with me wherever I go...couple that with the fact that I was born in Canada (granting me an unearned advantage over billions of my fellow human beings) I strongly believe it is my moral obligation to assist those who need it. I also believe in "teaching to fish" and Kiva helps me do just that....and really...helping just makes me happy. Kind of selfish, I know ;)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm responsible for a team of people that create and manage communcation pieces and programs designed to create awareness for our company and its' products. We write and create newsletters, sales presentations, promotional items and advertising.

lenders.name: Nyman Family
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we know how lucky we are to be farming in Canada.  No matter where you go, farming is a challenging and rewarding business and we enjoy helping others get to do it.
lenders.occupational_info:
My husband drives a transport truck to help pay our bills.  He's often away for days at a time.
I take a few neighbourhood children in for day care and run entrepreneurship programs for teenagers.
We also run what is considered a small sheep farm with 75 sheep!

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: Its a small way to make a big difference in someones life.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my children the power of giving.

lenders.name: John and Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: Help out in a small way.

lenders.name: Mindy
lenders.loan_because: Want to help those who are willing to work to make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Amtur-Rahman
lenders.loan_because: ALLAH gives to me every second of every day masha'allah

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage hard work and independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I create online learning courses for those who want to learn and access education by using the Internet.

lenders.name: Stravina
lenders.loan_because: Both my parents were entrepreneurs and worked very hard for all their children.I just want to see someone get the opportunity to realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am attending college and i work part time.Taking care of elderly and disabled patients in their homes.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Want to help those who are eager to better themselves and are willing to work hard for their goal.   Hoping to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I have the resources to help those who need a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with farmers and their families to  help them understand the financial side of their business so they can run their business better.  My philosophy is "Creating happy families and a healthy business".

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I have recently been to West Africa, and realized how hard it is to make a living for oneself. I know that even the smallest donation or loan can make a world of difference.
lenders.occupational_info: (I'm the girl on the left!). I have just  finished my bachelors degree and am hoping to go on to medical school.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.occupational_info: Taking care of other people, in a hospital setting.

lenders.name: Doreen
lenders.loan_because: I believe women are the force that will change the world for the better, so I feel privileged to help other women change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an author and playwright.

lenders.name: Johnny
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs an extended helping hand at one point or another.  I've used more than my fair share of extended helping hands.  It's time for me to extend my hands to those who need it.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: Even a small loan gives people a chance to make a difference in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I assess patients and provide care to meet their physiological and mental needs.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.occupation: Dance Studio Owner and Elementary Teacher
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach dance and school to children. I was given a scholarship to dance once, and it shaped my life and gave me faith!

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: It is so great to help other women succeed in business
lenders.occupational_info: I won the International Scholarship for Women in Business and work for the State of Maryland. I am getting my Masters degree at night and feel it is important to give back.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people hope!  And, I have faith in people.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a National non-profit organizational in the health industry.

lenders.name: April Joy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in redistributing wealth from North America to directly help develop other parts of the world

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: We should all help each other if you have the means!
lenders.occupational_info: Sports and Athletics

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for and it is the least that I can do.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's just the right thing to do...to lend a helping hand to those you can,

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed to be an American and live in the land of plenty. Hopefully I can help someone move out of poverty into a better life.

lenders.name: Esther
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a difference!

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Gretchen
lenders.loan_because: There are a lot of hard working people in this world who could be very successful if given the opportunity to start their venture.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach math to children who are 12-14 years old.

lenders.name: Rosalind
lenders.loan_because: Giveing is a gift from GOD you can not go wrong it make you feel good to know that you made a diffent in some one else life. If i can help some body as i travel alone then my giving will not be in vain.

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that no matter who you are or what your own life's circumstances are, there is always something you can do to help others. Even in these tough economic times, there is always someone whose need is greater than my own. There is nothing that makes me feel more alive and worthy than to give. It is an honor to help those helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the mother of  two wonderful sons. They are the joys of my life! I have been a flight attendant for Delta Air Lines for 24 years, but changed positions at Delta just 2.5 years ago. I am now a customer service supervisor. Some day I hope to live off the grid in a little cabin or yurt and spent my retirement traveling by train, kayak, RV.......basically any mode of transportation at ground level!  (I've  already seen much of the world from 30,000 feet)!

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.occupation: EA to the Minister of Education, NS
lenders.loan_because: Having the ability and means to give is in itself a gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the President of my own non-profit organization which funds education for females in Uganda

lenders.name: jan & john
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva gives us an opportunity to share our many blessings with someone who needs a helping hand up! 
we do what we can to support people within our own community but lending with Kiva allows us to help those who have nowhere else to turn.
lenders.occupational_info:
... jan is retired now from a real job and works at scrolling through the Kiva website and lurking on the forum at  www.kivafriends.org.
... john drives a school bus every day and loves being with the children.  
... we are both Christians trying to see the face of God where ever we turn and in whoever we meet.
... we are also "born straight but refuse to hate" so we fly the rainbow flag when opportunity arises. 

Learn more about Fistulas - - 
... watch the video From Despair To Dignity (5:08) 
www.yaninamanolova.com/fistula/index.html
then please click once for me on this link...
http://tinyurl.com/44vjutw 
... to help me earn .08 Euros for the Fistula Hospital, thanks in advance.

lenders.name: sylvester
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: n/a

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: In memory of my Mom and Dad.
lenders.occupational_info: Nonprofit medical management.

lenders.name: Dani
lenders.loan_because: Because I love it !!
lenders.occupational_info: I have to superviser health and safety of workers

lenders.name: Maria
Ingrid & Andy

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I like to Help People, Help them self.

lenders.occupational_info: I manage an office for a company that sell interior contruction materials for new homes

lenders.name: Kristy

I manage the sales and profits for a Grocery Store chain in the South East., US  This includes, deciding what items to sell, how to price them, when and how to promote them.  Basically, science, marketing and alot of favor.

I'm originally from the Caribbean and my dream is to create an avenue for those of us who have left and been succesful, to give back to the people and countries that raised us.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I know I can help someone in need.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: John & Fran
lenders.loan_because: We give because we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Extremely challenging, always changing, sometimes intense, and I wouldn't have it any other way.

lenders.name: Robby

lenders.occupational_info: I teach others how to grow & market their business.

lenders.name: Althea
lenders.loan_because: We all need help from time to time and I love the fact that there is a way that we can all truly be our brothers keeper. My heart is light knowing that they will have a chance when the was none before.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell hot dogs form a mobile vending cart. would like to expand to a building one day and hire other people.

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to have a single income and start a new business

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in this small way is good soup for the soul.  :-)

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I believe people prefer opportunity over charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who specialize in different types of technology.  The technology we use, and how we use it, helps the company we work for grow.

lenders.name: Dean Simon
lenders.loan_because: Everyone who can help others should.  We know the feeling wanting to start a business and no one is there to assist you financially.
lenders.occupational_info: Telecommunications Company - My company provides phones to businesses.

lenders.name: Elizabeth & Hugh
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am so very fortunate in my life.  I want to be able to pass that good fortune on to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Fortunately, my job is universal.  Being a mom doesn't need explanation.  The main difference is that I am fortunate to be able to stay home and not have to work.

lenders.name: Moira
lenders.loan_because: I am able.

lenders.name: Mike and Deb
lenders.loan_because: The future of our world depends on global understanding and cooperation. We want to reach out to give people of the world an opportunity to make a future for themselves.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.occupational_info: Assist individuals and small businesses get from where they are to where they want to be!

lenders.name: Lena
lenders.loan_because: I recently traced my DNA to Sierra Leone and would like to contribute to my African family.  I want to be able to help make a difference in someone life.

lenders.name: Rev. Terry
lenders.loan_because:
The world has become a smaller place thanks to the World Wide Web. I loan to 
help my neighbor. I loan to help my sisters and borthers.
lenders.occupational_info:
I play a few roles; teach in a college, minister & serve others through my Interfaith 
training, offer support as a counselor, and encourage healing through energy work.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I understand it takes a little help sometimes to be successful and I want entrepreneurs to be successful.

lenders.name: Payal
lenders.loan_because: Hopefully I can make a difference in someone's life for the better and they in turn can can help someone else....the chain will make the world a better more caring place...

lenders.name: Leigh and Daniel
lenders.occupation: Stay at home Mom and Student

lenders.name: mendy
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help someone have a chance to have a good life. I dont have much to give, I wish it was more.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom, and my husband is a roofer!

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: it is the least I can do.

lenders.name: AJM
lenders.loan_because: Started my own business with a small loan. This is one way to pass along the same chance I got.
lenders.occupational_info: Clean Homes

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I can and would like to help others achieve some sense of security for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a banker.

lenders.name: Cherae
lenders.loan_because: I hope I never have so little that I feel I'm unable to share with another who's less fortunate.  Just think of what a wonderful world this would be if everyone gave someone else a little help when they need it.  So little to us can mean so very much to someone else.  To be of service is the greatest gift!

lenders.name: Frederick
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good knowing that I am giving someone a chance. We have all been given a chance at some point in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a private pharmacy.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people acheive their goals and make their dreams come true - for me that is the ultimate gift to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I co-ordinate advertising for a national retail company. I make sure that the production schedules are met for flyers and ads.

lenders.name: Larissa
lenders.loan_because: Incredibly seflish motivations - it feels good to help someone else!!  I hope that the small amount I have to share will make a difference for someone!
lenders.occupational_info: I am the director of a social service program working with children who have emotional disturbances.

lenders.name: Mitzie
lenders.loan_because: I have much to be thankful for and I'd like to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm now retired. I worked as therapist or counselor to those with mental health and substance abuse problems

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: It gives me an opportunity to help someone who wants to improve their situation but is unable without help.  Helping others is makes you feel wonderful inside.

lenders.name: Priscilla
lenders.loan_because: it makes my heart smile.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I think we all have a humanitarian responsibility to help others in need. It all starts with a vision...

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I believe every one deserves the right to develop pride in themselves and to be able to break the chains of poverty that bind them.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a clothing shop. I have worked very hard and have been blessed with the rewards of being able to provide for my family.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: this is a really cool thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I direct an eco-theology project and I am learning to write novels.

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: I saw this on Oprah and loved the idea of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work monitoring,  analyzing, and forecasting the program budgets for the state department of aging and disability services in Texas.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: these people need a hand up, not a hand out.  There is no reason not to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: Sarita
lenders.loan_because: It should be our duty in this world to help those less fourtunate than us and to encourage them to reach their full potential.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: To give someone else an opportunity to pursue their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: teaching and education in the Canadian Military

lenders.name: Matty
lenders.loan_because: I feel to help even if it is a grain of sand. for each grain counts to build gteat dunes
lenders.occupational_info: straight commission ,what I enjoy helping people

lenders.name: StewY
lenders.loan_because: Like helping other people!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Make engine parts for Honda Motors...

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I loan for the reason that many people do. It makes me happy to help someone create a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as security staff in a municipal building.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because:
I am THRILLED to have found out about this organization today, 11/22/07.  It was truly by providence that I happened to turn on Oprah today and found myself glued to all the wonderful information. This site is now in my favs and I will continue to help in any way I can. BRAVO KIVA!!  I've even posted the info on my blog space and will be sending out emails as well.  It is most important to realize that even one "lender" stay involved.  After all, we are all linked in this world.
I, myself, am now retired, and even though I have to budget, Kiva is part of that.  I think it's very important to give back to others, even if it's only small amounts that can be done at a time. In my mind, this is a way to link all cultures and people in real unity. It's true caring from the heart.

lenders.name: Vicky
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed with many things in life and want to give back.  I do much volunteer work locally but want to do something on a bigger scale.
lenders.occupational_info: Legal

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.loan_because: I like to help women progress.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a helping hand is greater than a handout.

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.loan_because: I get a rush out of watching meager turn into MASSIVE!
lenders.occupational_info:
Primary Job: Momma
Secondary Job: ESL Teacher

lenders.name: Margo
lenders.loan_because: It is such an appropriate thing to do - and I am grateful for the chance to make a difference with even a small amount of money.
lenders.occupational_info: Much of my time is devoted to fund raising for breast cancer research.  I know we must all be a part of the solution.  There are many problems  to solve.

lenders.name: Sharon Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I believe all people should have a chance to improve their way of life and help others at the same time. If starting a business is what you feel called to do, you should be able to get money at a reasonable cost.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm mainly an RN which means that I am a registered nurse who helps people to get better. I work mainly with the elderly to make sure they get quality care at this time of their life.

I am, also, a very proud Oma(which means grandma in German) to Caitlyn Jane who is now 24 months old but was about 7 months old in this picture of me, my husband and Caitlyn Jane.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I am a fortunate person and would love to pass on some of that benefit to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the area of birthing mothers as a midwife/nurse

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with many opportunities starting with a good education.  I loan because it may help someone else with their opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I have several initiatives underway including a new aquatic products website. I also raise paint horses.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: When I was just getting started I was very blessed by kind gestures from a few people and now it is my turn to give back and help another person achieve his or her dream!
lenders.occupational_info: I am very fortunate to do something I love and therefore it never really seems like work.  I create comfortable and attractive environments for people to live in.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: I know I can make a difference in other's lives, no matter where they live or how small the contribution.

lenders.name: Bro. Matthias
lenders.loan_because: To try to make life a little easier for people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Benedictine monk.

lenders.loan_because: I dont main to help but i nede first to be help to in troduce my product to the market and dear i can help oters.
lenders.occupational_info: Les avantages du projet (M.P.S.) Infinito pourraient bien servir pour chauffer et alimenter les maisons unifamiliales ou semi-détachées, aux chalets et aux maisons de campagne, et plus incroyable encore, à l’automobile de l’avenir qui ne consumerait ni gasoline ou Diesel ou Ethanol, mais qui fonctionnerait à l’énergie produite de l’eau, de l’anti-gel et de l’huile minérale.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: This was a gift certificate and some-thing that I had never heard of.  It is a wonderful opportunity for both lender and receiver to work towards the same goal .
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a medium security men's prison, specifically in the counseling department.  My job is to ensure that offenders receive services to assist them in their rehabilitation back into society.  This requires supervision of counselors and their daily duties.
